system.availability: Fits over Astartes Scout Armour as well as most body sizes. Consists of sturdy web belts that consist of various pouches such as: Clip Pouches (Hold two clips), Medicae Pouch (contains patches, contraseptics, single-use injectors, Astartes Detox, Pain Suppressant, Morpha, Resuscitex, etc, providfes +20 to Medicae Tests), Vox Pouch (Astartes Vox Unit), Grenade Pouch (4 Krak/Frag Grenades), Knife Pouch (One Astartes Combat Knife), Shotgun Pouch (8 Astartes Shotgun Rounds), Sidearm Holster (one Astartes Sidearm), Drop Pouch (Holds Spare Mags, has a Draw String or Magnetic Lock).
system.cost:
Consists of various pouches, may have more than what is listed.
Used by Astartes Scouts.
